name: By the Bonfire (Ats)
description:
Once a year, you and your friends meet to catch up and reminesce about the old times. To spice things up, you decide to make it a race. See if you can become the champion by finishing first! Or stick around and enjoy the trip leisurely.

How to Play

Press Space to interact.

WASD to move.

Esc to stop interacting while running.
